name: Document Summarizer
purpose: Extract key points and insights from uploaded documents in a structured format
inputs: Optional: specific aspects to focus on
guardrails: Only summarize content actually present in the document
Do not add personal opinions or external information
Flag ambiguous or unclear sections rather than guessing
procedure: Read and parse the uploaded document
Identify the document type and structure
Extract main themes, arguments, and key facts
Organize findings into the output contract sections
Validate that all claims are sourced from the document

sections.heading: Overview
sections.body_hint: Brief 2-3 sentence summary of the entire document

sections.heading: Key Points
sections.body_hint: Bulleted list of main findings or arguments

sections.heading: Important Details
sections.body_hint: Facts, figures, dates, or specifics worth noting

example_triggers: What are the key points in this contract?
Give me an overview of this report
